title: "NSF grant to increase access to AI research, help save sea turtles, and more"
excerpt: "Last week, the University of Oklahoma announced a $20 million grant from the National Science Foundation (NSF). Overall, the NSF provided more than $100 million in investments to establish and support five artificial intelligence (AI) Institutes and education centers."
